titleStmt.title: To the right honourable the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament the humble petition of Francis Newton, Gent. Captain James Wadsworth, Thomas Mayo, and Robert Deluk[e] Messengers allowed by these Honourable Houses; and Richard Rawlyns, Henry Newton, Thomas Roult, a[nd] Richard Payne, assistants to the said messengers.
titleStmt.author: Newton, Francis, brother of William Newton.
